{"id":718021507,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1654769572,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/718021507/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6 MB","code":"typedef long long int ll ;\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    double calpow(double base ,ll power){\n        if(power == 0)\n            return 1.0;\n        double half = calpow(base ,power/2);\n        if(power %2 == 0)\n           return half*half;\n        else\n            return half *half *base;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        ll N =n;\n        if(n <0){\n            N= -N;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        \n        double ans  = calpow(x,n);\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
